service_requests.title: Leaking kitchen faucet
service_requests.description: Tenant reports a steady drip from the kitchen faucet. Has been ongoing for ~2 days.

service_requests.title: Broken bedroom window latch
service_requests.description: Window in the master bedroom won't latch shut. Security concern.

service_requests.title: HVAC not cooling
service_requests.description: AC unit is running but blowing warm air. Thermostat set to 72°F, reading 81°F.

service_requests.title: Garage door opener malfunction
service_requests.description: Remote and wall button both unresponsive. Tenant manually lifting door.

notes.author: Anya Patel
notes.text: Replaced logic board. Tested remote and wall button — both operational.

service_requests.title: Mailbox lock jammed
service_requests.description: Key won't turn in the community mailbox lock. Tenant unable to retrieve mail for 3 days.

service_requests.title: Water stain on ceiling tile
service_requests.description: Large brown stain appeared on a ceiling tile in the main conference room. Possible roof leak.

notes.author: Marcus Rivera
notes.text: Inspected roof — found cracked flashing near HVAC unit. Roofer scheduled for Monday.

notes.author: Marcus Rivera
notes.text: Replaced ceiling tile as temporary fix. Bucket placed as precaution.

service_requests.title: Parking lot pothole
service_requests.description: Large pothole near the entrance of the south parking lot. Multiple tenants have complained.

service_requests.title: Request to repaint living room
service_requests.description: Tenant requesting repaint due to scuff marks and faded paint. Last painted: unknown.

service_requests.title: Elevator inspection due
service_requests.description: Annual elevator inspection is overdue. Certificate expired December 2024.

notes.author: Jordan Kim
notes.text: Contacted elevator maintenance company. Inspector available Jan 20.
